title: Bug 7581: ComboBoxCellEditor does not size correctly in property sheet
OB: The ComboBoxCellEditor in the property sheet does not adjust its width to match the width of the column.
EB: I would expect the ComboBoxCellEditor to always match the width of the property sheet column. Currently, it does not adjust its width.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Open the property sheet with a column containing a ComboBoxCellEditor. 
2. Notice that the ComboBoxCellEditor does not match the width of the property sheet column.
